body_html:
Looking at your gist in https://gist.github.com/kmhofmann/e368a2ebba05f807fa1a90b3bf9a1e03 it seems you're using git checkout v1.7.0. There is no such branch in the repository, so that command likely did not switch you to the appropriate branch.

Release branches in this repository are named r<version>, so you'd want to do git checkout r1.7 instead.

Closing this since this seems to be an error in the steps being followed. Please feel free to re-open or create a new issue with more details if I'm mistaken. Thanks!

Release branches in this repository are named r<version>, so you'd want to do git checkout r1.7 instead.
Closing this since this seems to be an error in the steps being followed. Please feel free to re-open or create a new issue with more details if I'm mistaken. Thanks!
body:
Looking at your gist in https://gist.github.com/kmhofmann/e368a2ebba05f807fa1a90b3bf9a1e03 it seems you're using `git checkout v1.7.0`. There is no such branch in the repository, so that command likely did not switch you to the appropriate branch.

Release branches in this repository are named `r<version>`, so you'd want to do `git checkout r1.7` instead.

Closing this since this seems to be an error in the steps being followed. Please feel free to re-open or create a new issue with more details if I'm mistaken. Thanks!
